# 3rd Party OS Package Managers

## RPM-based distributions

*   [GetPageSpeed RPM](https://github.com/GetPageSpeed/n98-magerun2-rpm) – RPM packaging for installing n98-magerun2 on RHEL/CentOS/Alma/Rocky systems.

## Nix ecosystem
*   [Nix Packages](https://search.nixos.org/packages?channel=unstable&from=0&size=50&sort=relevance&type=packages&query=magerun) – Installable via `nix-env`/flakes for NixOS and other Nix-enabled systems.
